about_the_game:
Futa on Male, Male on Female, Futa on Female
* A new story with fresh characters (not a sequel).

You're new girlfriend is spending the weekend at your place while your dad and stepmom are out of town.

Convinced that you're finally going to see her naked, you're surprised to find that your eyes aren't the first to see some skin.
And your cheeky stepsis isn't exactly the sharing type...

Read through some pretty raunchy(erotic) dialogue, accompanied by spicy nude depictions.

Gameplay

Kinetic Visual Novel

H-Scenes
~4K words

Immerse yourself in the story by typing in your own name, then proceeding to read through a raunchy story from the first-person perspective.

content_descriptors.notes:
*All characters in this game are over the age of 21 years old.

- Futanari

- Dirty language
